titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached in the Kings Chappell at VVhite-Hall, on Sunday last July 15. 1649. By Henry Walker cleric. author of the Perfect occurrences.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "July 20."; "Ironmonger" is inserted after "Henry Walker".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
